page.title: 05Attitudes Lifestyle School
page.content: First thing in the morning my sister Katie wakes me up because she wants a drink. I go downstairs and get one. While I am downstairs I make our breakfast. We have Oat Crunchies. We love them. After breakfast I go up stairs and get washed and dressed. Then I comb my hair, put on my shoes and coat then go to school. When I get there the children are usually in the playground. Then one of the teachers claps her hands and we line up to go in. Our classrooms look funny - they are like oblong caravans with steps. We do our work which Mrs Whitfield set. We go to the Hall at 10.30. Mrs James, the head teacher reads us a story about God. Then we go out to play. We do some more work before lunch at 12.00. In the afternoon we have a story .Then I go home and play with my friends.(Fay)
